course_description:
Fundamental algorithms and mathematics in production of computer animation and video games, emphasizing control and rendering of animated characters.
Prereq: 3901, 3902, or 3903; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Music (BS), or ECE major. Not open to students with credit for 5541.
course_prerequisites: Prereq: 3901, 3902, or 3903; and enrollment in CSE, CIS, Music (BS), or ECE major. Not open to students with credit for 5541.
